frontmatter.title: Process and task mining 300-level live demo
frontmatter.description: Process and task mining 300-level live demo

internal.content:
--- title: Process and task mining 300-level live demo description: Process and task mining 300-level live demo tabs: [ 'Demo preparation', 'Demo script'] --- export const Title = () => ( Process and task mining
300-level live demo ); ![Banner](./images/Process_mining_prep_banner.jpg) | DEMO OVERVIEW | | | :--- | :--- | | **Scenario overview** | This demo shows how IBM’s process mining capabilities are used to discover and analyze business processes and identify areas for improvement. A customer account closing example is used to showcase how process mining helps an organization meet regulatory requirements while also reducing process execution cost. | | **Demo products** | Cloud Pak for Business Automation | | **Demo capabilities** | Process mining; Task mining | | **Demo script** | A complete demo script is on the second tab above.

This demo script has multiple tasks, that each have multiple steps. In each step, you have the details about what you need to do (**Actions**), what you can say while delivering this demo step (**Narration**), and what diagrams and screenshots you will see.

This demo script is a suggestion, and you are welcome to customize based on your sales opportunity. Most importantly, practice this demo in advance. If the demo seems easy for you to execute, the customer will focus on the content. If it seems difficult for you to execute, the customer will focus on your delivery. | | **How to get support** | Contact #itz-techzone-support or techzone.help@ibm.com regarding issues with reserving and provisioning TechZone environments.

Contact #platinumdemos-automation-support regarding issues with setting up and running this demo use case. | ## **INSTALL THE DEMO**
1 - Provision a Technology Zone demo environment
Reserve a Technology Zone demo environment here.
**[Go to top](#top)**
2 - Restart the Process Mining VMs
1. Access your Technology Zone environment using the link in the reservation email. You may also use the IBM Technology Zone’s **My Library** → **My Reservations** page.
NOTE: The VMs start automatically but MUST be restarted for the demo to run properly. Follow the steps below to restart.
2. Click the **Shutdown VM(s)** button to shut down all three VMs. Wait for the VMs to shut down.


3. Click the **Run VM(s)** button to start all three VMs.

NOTE: If the Run VM(s) button is not activated after completing the shutdown, you may need to refresh the page.


4. Click to open the **IBM Process Mining Server** VM.


NOTE: You will need to wait several minutes for the Process Mining server to start.
**[Go to top](#top)**
3 - Restart the analytics server
1. Open **Terminal**.


2. Type '**cd /opt/processmining/bin**' in the terminal.


3. Type '**sudo ./pm-analytics.sh stop**' in the terminal. The analytics server will stop.


4. Type '**sudo ./pm-analytics.sh start**' in the terminal. The analytics server will start. Wait for the command to complete.



**[Go to top](#top)**
4 - Initialize the Task Mining model
1. Click **Activities**.


2. Click **Firefox**.


3. Click **Restore Session**.


4. Enter '**maintenance.admin**' for the **UserID** (1) and '**IBMDem0s!**' for the **Password** (2), and click **Sign in** (3).


5. From the **Process mining** workspace, click **Task Mining: BO Service Closure**.


6. Click **Visualize your process**.


7. Click **Processes** to return to the Process Mining workspace.



**[Go to top](#top)**
## **PREPARE TO GIVE THE DEMO**
1 - Open the IBM Process Mining workspace
NOTE: If you're already logged in, skip steps 1-4 and start at step 5 below.
1. Click **Activities**.


2. Click **Firefox**.


3. Click **IBM Process Mining | Sign in** on the bookmark toolbar.


4. Enter '**maintenance.admin**' for the **UserID** (1) and '**IBMDem0s!**' for the **Password** (2), and click **Sign in** (3).


5. From the **Process mining** workspace, click **Account Closure**.


6. The **Account Closure** model is now open. Click the **Datasource** tab.


7. The **Datasource** tab is now open. You're ready to give the demo.


**[Go to top](#top)**
*** Click [here](/300-business-automation-process-and-task-mining/demo-script) to go to the **Demo script** on the next tab.
